name: The Great
description: In-game content You take on the role of a person with special powers. You live in the city with these criminals (in the first early access of the game, these criminals would be just ordinary people. But there will be more content and characters that are complex and have special powers as well) that you will have to fight with. These criminals will make your life difficult. Plus you have to work. To make a living for yourself.  People or NPCs in the game is very effective to your life Often they will ask you for help but this help will bring danger to you as well.
